content.rendered:
OWC’s John MacAskill is interviewed in issue 4 of InDepth WIND. John discusses recent OWC milestones, floating wind foundations, OWC R&D and floating LiDAR in the article.

 

[vc_btn title=”Read the interview” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”primary” i_type=”openiconic” i_icon_openiconic=”vc-oi vc-oi-book-open” add_icon=”true” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.indepthwind.com%2F2018%2Fissue4%2F%23p%3D46||target:%20_blank|”]
